## SystemSearchQueryProps.fullTextQuery property

Input for the full-text query. The following characters have special meaning in the query syntax: + - &amp;amp;&amp;amp; \|\| ! ( ) { } \[ \] ^ " \~ \* ? : \\<!-- -->\\ To use any of these characters without their syntactical meaning, to escape them by preceding the character with a \\<!-- -->\\<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
fullTextQuery?: string;
```
